lead_paragraph: Interim Brazilian President Michel Temer declared the first Olympics in South America open on Friday, kicking off the Rio de Janeiro Games after a more than three-hour opening ceremony.

headline.print_headline: Brazil's Interim President Declares Olympic Games Open
headline.main: Brazil's Interim President Declares Olympic Games Open
